body: @natac13 can you share the steps to reproduce?

The second link is to a sandbox with the updated react-hook-form, which leads to the reset call not updating the watched value as it does in the first link. What more did you need @bluebill1049? Sorry for my confusion.
oh no worries @natac13 it's at the `useEffect` i will take a look at during lunch time or after work üëç

In the first link the reset call updates the watched value of the first component and a statement is logged in the console.log view. However when I updated the react-hook-form package to 6.9.4 and created the second link the usewatch is no longer updated.

Thanks for the help.
Hey @ChrisSargent, The newest version 6.9.5 works great from me! Thanks to @bluebill1049
